content:
TASK: Craft an item of type: spruce_wood
inventory=[{"type": "diamond_horse_armor", "quantity": 1, "index": 10}, {"type": "spruce_log", "quantity": 4, "index": 11}, {"type": "basalt", "quantity": 19, "index": 31}, {"type": "bone_block", "quantity": 1, "index": 39}, {"type": "glass_pane", "quantity": 45, "index": 42}]
thought: I have 4 spruce_log items in my inventory, so I need to move them all into the crafting grid. I will start with the one in slot 11 and place it into slot 1.
Ok
act: move from slot 11 to slot 1 with quantity 1

TASK: Craft an item of type: spruce_wood
inventory=[{"type": "spruce_planks", "quantity": 4, "index": 0}, {"type": "spruce_log", "quantity": 1, "index": 1}, {"type": "diamond_horse_armor", "quantity": 1, "index": 10}, {"type": "spruce_log", "quantity": 3, "index": 11}, {"type": "basalt", "quantity": 19, "index": 31}, {"type": "bone_block", "quantity": 1, "index": 39}, {"type": "glass_pane", "quantity": 45, "index": 42}]
thought: The first spruce_log has been placed into the crafting grid. I will now place the second one to the right of the first one (ie., into slot 2).
Ok
act: move from slot 11 to slot 2 with quantity 1

TASK: Craft an item of type: spruce_wood
inventory=[{"type": "spruce_log", "quantity": 1, "index": 1}, {"type": "spruce_log", "quantity": 1, "index": 2}, {"type": "diamond_horse_armor", "quantity": 1, "index": 10}, {"type": "spruce_log", "quantity": 2, "index": 11}, {"type": "basalt", "quantity": 19, "index": 31}, {"type": "bone_block", "quantity": 1, "index": 39}, {"type": "glass_pane", "quantity": 45, "index": 42}]
thought: The second spruce_log has been placed into the crafting grid. I will now place the third one below the first one (ie., into slot 4).
Ok
act: move from slot 11 to slot 4 with quantity 1

TASK: Craft an item of type: spruce_wood
inventory=[{"type": "spruce_log", "quantity": 1, "index": 1}, {"type": "spruce_log", "quantity": 1, "index": 2}, {"type": "spruce_log", "quantity": 1, "index": 4}, {"type": "diamond_horse_armor", "quantity": 1, "index": 10}, {"type": "spruce_log", "quantity": 1, "index": 11}, {"type": "basalt", "quantity": 19, "index": 31}, {"type": "bone_block", "quantity": 1, "index": 39}, {"type": "glass_pane", "quantity": 45, "index": 42}]
thought: The third spruce_log has been placed into the crafting grid. I will now place the fourth one to the right of the third one (ie., into slot 5).
Ok
act: move from slot 11 to slot 5 with quantity 1

TASK: Craft an item of type: spruce_wood
inventory=[{"type": "spruce_wood", "quantity": 3, "index": 0}, {"type": "spruce_log", "quantity": 1, "index": 1}, {"type": "spruce_log", "quantity": 1, "index": 2}, {"type": "spruce_log", "quantity": 1, "index": 4}, {"type": "spruce_log", "quantity": 1, "index": 5}, {"type": "diamond_horse_armor", "quantity": 1, "index": 10}, {"type": "basalt", "quantity": 19, "index": 31}, {"type": "bone_block", "quantity": 1, "index": 39}, {"type": "glass_pane", "quantity": 45, "index": 42}]
thought: The fourth spruce_log has been placed into the crafting grid. I can now craft the spruce_wood. I will move it from the craft slot (0) to a free inventory slot (eg., 11).
Ok
act: move from slot 0 to slot 11 with quantity 3
